[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@datashaper/tables](./tables.md) &gt; [TableContainer](./tables.tablecontainer.md)

## TableContainer interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TableContainer<T = unknown> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [context?](./tables.tablecontainer.context.md) |  | T | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional contextual data about the table. For example, if the table was created using a process/transformation that has additional information to relay, that context can be stored here. |
|  [id](./tables.tablecontainer.id.md) |  | string | This is the formal id for a table, and must be unique within the store. A URI would normally be appropriate. |
|  [metadata?](./tables.tablecontainer.metadata.md) |  | [TableMetadata](./tables.tablemetadata.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional metadata block for the table. This can follow the container around to help avoid recomputes. |
|  [table?](./tables.tablecontainer.table.md) |  | ColumnTable | <i>(Optional)</i> This is the actual Arquero table instance to store. If it has not been resolved yet it will be undefined. |
